author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Timely completion of ASW’s pilot testing urged by ASEANTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Timely completion of ASW’s pilot testing urged by ASEAN Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
The significance of the timely completion of the full-fledged pilot testing of the ASEAN Single Window (ASW) and evaluation of the ASW Pilot Project by 2015 was highlighted the 47th ASEAN Economic Ministers’ Meeting (AEM) and Related Meetings in Kuala Lumpur on Tuesday (Aug 25).
In a joint statement, ASEAN ministers welcomed commencement of the implementation of the full-fledged ASW Pilot Project Component 2.
According to the statement issued at the end of the meeting, “The ministers stressed the importance of timely completion of the full fledged pilot testing of the ASW and evaluation of the ASW Pilot Project by 2015.”
The ASW is a unique regional initiative with the objective of expediting cargo clearance within the context of increased economic integration in ASEAN.
ASW’s main goals are to achieve simpler and faster processing time, and a more transparent way of doing business.
